column2: "Here are our cards. Now that you have received them, you will be sure to call on us, won't you?"
"I must atone for my sins, and he seeks like-minded warriors from whom he may learn about himself..."
"I am very grateful to Administrator Seraphy. She has done so much for we Weaponoids."
"Mhm, I'm glad we followed the administrator's advice and took on this mission. Let us make the most of our time together!"
"...Oh, you should ask Ignis about the details of the mission. She's the one in charge. I just need to fight."
